attributes.action: Enforce the exsisting legislation to ensure councils maintian the highways properly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The british road network is now a laughing stock. It is full of holes and the carriageways are slowly degenerating due to a lack of investment, and increased traffic volumes, not to mention the effects of weather. Whether you are a motorist,a cyclist or a motor biker the state of britons road network is a major health and safety issue.We dont need speed bumps we have more than enought holes to "calm traffic"
John lennon wrote "4000 holes in Blackburn lancashire" how many are there today... millions acros the UK!!
All we are asking is that some of the billions collected in road tax are spent on just that putting  "THE ROADS" back together.
